title: Kkotmil
description: Kotmil (꽃밀) vegan bakery is located on the first basement of Changbi publishers. Cafe Changbi is on the first floor. Offers all-vegan breads, breakfast pastries, cakes, cookies, desserts. Also sell vegan gluten-free and soy-free goods. Uses non-gmo ingredients and organic sugar. You could buy baked goods on the basement and go back up to the cafe to get some drinks.
